Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Longship
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A type of narrow and relatively long boat with a sleek design, often equipped with sails for propulsion. It is commonly used for various purposes such as transportation, exploration, and warfare throughout history.
